top.title: in case where the lessee do not pay rent even if the lessor of a building have receive a security deposit and that security deposit will satisfy unpaid rent heshe shall have a statutory lien .

in case where a lessee of a building have not pay the purchase money with respect to the sale of a dresser for a furniture store and have not pay the rent for the lessor the furniture store statutory lien with respect to the dresser shall prevail over the lessor statutory lien with respect to the same .
if a company do not pay salary the employee shall have a statutory lien with respect to the salary regardless of the unpaid period over the entire property of the company .

in case where a company have not pay the purchase money with respect to the sale of refrigerator for an electronics store and it have not pay salary for its employee the electronics store statutory lien with respect to the refrigerator shall prevail over employeess statutory lien with respect to the same .

in case where an obligor own an immovable property and a movable property which be not the subject of an agreed security interest a right of retention and a special statutory lien the holder of general statutory lien be first pay out of the immovable property and they be pay out of the movable property only if the claim that be not satisfied remains .
a mandate shall terminate when the mandatary dy but shall not terminate when the mandator die .
the revolving mortgage which the principal be fix secures not only fixed payment of principal but also interest up to the maximum amount .
the statutory lien over movable shall prevail over the pledge of movable .
extension of security interest to proceeds of collateral may be do with respect to a right of retention a statutory lien a pledge and a mortgage .
a right of retention shall not be extinguish even if the holder of the right of retention lose possession of the thing retain but in this case this right may not be assert against third party .
in case where a and b co-own the land x if b acquire the servitude to pass through the c land y by prescription a shall also acquire the same .
a minor may not be an adoptive parent .
in case where the agent b for a conclude a contract for sale by c fraud b may rescind the contract for sale however a may not rescind it .

in case where a privetely appoint agent appoint its sub-agent when there be an unavoidable reason to do so even if the sub-agent have incur cost find to be necessary for the administration of the mandated business heshe may not claim reimbursement of those cost from the principal .

in the case where a and b be marry to each other and have a minor child c if c be 18 year old even if a died and the parental authority of b be suspend after as death c may marry when heshe obtain the consent of b .
with respect to the principal secure by a revolving mortgage if the date when the principal be to be fix be not prescribe the revolving mortgage shall be void .

if the counterparty of unauthorized agency be negligent in not know that the person who conclude a contract hold himselfherself out as an agent of another person have no authority of agency heshe may not pursue the liability of the unauthorized agent in civil code .

in case where an obligee have receive full performance by way of performance by subrogation it shall be sufficient if heshe delivers to the subrogee the instrument regard the claim and heshe need not deliver to the subrogee any security heshe possess .
a guardian of adult may not appoint its sub-agent unless there be an unavoidable reason to do so .
the authority of agency shall be terminate upon rule for commencement of guardianship against the agent .

in the case where a and b agree that a sell a picture-painted plate with the name of a famous potter which a own hereinafter refer to as p to b for 3 million yen and that b pay the purchase money to c if a deliver p to b after they have conclude the contract for sale but b doesnt pay to c 3 million yen which be the purchase money for p c may demand performance of the obligation and cancel the contract for sale between a and b .
a married person shall adopt a minor only jointly with the spouse except in the case where heshe adopt a child in wedlock of hisher spouse or hisher spouse be incapable of indicate herhis intention .
a monetary claim may not be make indivisible due to the manifestation of intention of the party involve .

in the case where a be an adult ward at the time when a receive a manifestation of intention of cancellation of a contract the cancellation of the contract shall not take effect until as guardian of adult c have acquire the knowledge of bs manifestation of intention of cancellation of the contract .

in the case where a lose hisher capacity to act after the dispatch of the notice of an offer of a contract to b who be a person at a distance even if b know such fact the offer of the contract shall become effective .
if special circumstance exist the family court may also impose a duty of support between a nephew and an aunt .

in the case where an adult ward a purchase a daily household item from b even if b do not know that a be an adult ward hisher guardian of adult c may rescind the contract for sale of the daily household item .

in the case where a contract for revolve guarantee on loan provide a principal determination date if it be provide that such principal determination date shall fall on the day on which six year have elapse after the day of the conclusion of the relevant contract for the revolving guarantee on loan the principal determination date thereof shall fall on the day on which five year have elapse after the day of the conclusion of the relevant contract for revolve guarantee on loan .

in the case where a lose hisher capacity to act after the dispatch of the notice of cancellation of a contract to b who be a person at a distance even if b know such fact the cancellation of the contract shall become effective .
in the case where a lose hisher capacity to act after the dispatch of the notice of acceptance of a contract to b who be a person at a distance even if b know such fact the contract shall be form .
a minor may rescind the juristic act which be perform without the consent of hisher satutory agent individually .
a minor may not become an agent .

in case where there be a special agreement in a contract of sale to the effect that the seller will not provide the warranty against defect if the seller know but do not disclose that there be any latent defect in the subject matter of a sale heshe may not be release from the warranty against defect .

in case where a lessee lawfully sublease a leased thing if the lessor assume an obligation to the lessee to effect repair of the lease thing the lessor shall also assume a direct obligation to the sublesee to effect repair of the lease thing .
pledgee of movable may if the pledged thing be usurped demand the return of the same for the pledge .
a minor who have attain 15 year of age may be a witness to a will .
a minor who be permit to carry on one or more kind of business shall have the same capacity to act as a person of the age of majority as far as such business be concern .
while a minor be subject to the joint parental authority of hisher parent heshe may not be adopt by hisher grandparent .

if there be a mistake in any element of the juristic act which be induce by any fraud and manifestation of intention be induce by the mistakethe person who make the manifestation of intention may assert such nullity of the manifestation of intention by mistake .

even if there be a mistake in any element of the juristic act in question and manifestation of intention be induce by the mistake the person who make the manifestation of intention may not assert such nullity of the manifestation of intention by mistake if twenty year have elapse from the time of the manifestation of intention .
in the absence of any special agreement the mandatary may claim remuneration from the mandator .

in case where the party do not define the time for return in a contract for value of deposit for consumption of money the depositor may not demand the return of money unless heshe issue a notice of demand to the depositary specify a reasonable period .
a third party who effect an effective performance not against the will of the obligor shall be subrogate by operation of law to the claim of the obligee by effect performance .

a superficiary may assign the superficies without obtain the approval of the owner of the land but a lessee may not assign the lessee right without obtain the approval of the lessor or the court permission in lieu of it .

in case where a guardian adopt a ward who be a minor and have no family relationship with the guardian if the guarian obtain the permission of the family court with respect to the adoption of minor heshe do not have to obtain the same with respect to the adoption of hisher ward .
both superficies and right to lease land can not be the subject matter of a mortgage .
if the subject of the claim be to be identify by way of choice among more than one performance the right to make the choice shall vest in the obligee .

in the case where a and b be marry to each other and have a minor child c if a and b divorce they agree that b shall have parental authority in relation to c b remarrys d after that and d adopts cb and d shall have parental authority in relation to c .

in case where there be any latent defect in the subject matter of a sale if the buyer demand compensation for damage base on a warranty against defect within one year from the time when heshe come to know the existence of the defect extinctive prescription of the right to demand compensation for damage shall not be complete even if 10 year have pass at that time since heshe receive the delivery of the subject matter of the sale .
in case where a mandate be cancel for default the cancellation shall be effective solely toward the future .
in case where b believe stand tree on the land which a own to be on the land whichb own therefore b severs and get the standing tree b shall acquire the ownership thereof by immediate acquisition .
an obligor of a partnership may set off hisher obligation against hisher claim against the partner .
a partnership shall be dissolve on the successful completion of the business that be its object .
a quasi-mandate shall be effective even if it be not make in write but a mandate shall not be effective unless it be make in writing .
if a creditor of a partnership do not know when hisher claim arise the proportion of the partner share of loss the creditor may exercise hisher right against each partner in equal proportion .
a husband and wife may make their will on the same certificate .
the order of priority of special statutory lienspledges and mortgage with respect to the same immovable property shall follow the chronological order of their registration .
if a decedent have indicate an intention by will to disinherit a presumed heir the disinheritance of that presume heir shall have effect solely by that indication .
a decedent may by will entrust the form of division of inherited property to a third party .

in the case where there exist several person under a duty to give support and agreement have not or can not be reach between the party with respect to the order in which they be to give support the family court shall determine the order .
with respect to any obligation for an inaction a request may be make to the court at the expense of the obligor seek the removal of the outcome of the action perform by the obligor .
in the case where a and b be marry to each other and have a minor child c if a be an adult ward parental authority over c shall be exercise jointly by as guardian of adult and b .
before the principal be fix a revolve mortgagee may assign a revolving mortgage or effect a partial assignment of the revolving mortgage without the approval of the revolve mortgagor .

in case where several testamentary gift infringe any legal reserve portion and the claim of abatement be exercise each testamentary gift shall be abate proportionally accord to the value of the object of that testamentary gift if the testator have not indicate a particular intent in hisher will .
if the alteration of obligors with respect to a revolving mortgage be not register before the principal be fix it shall be deem that such alteration be not effect .
when the scope of the claim to be secure by a revolving mortgage be alter before the principal be fix the approval of subordinated obligees have to be obtain .
if a mortgagee demand that a third party who purchase the ownership of mortgage immovable property pay the price of the same to the relevant mortgagee the third party must respond to the request .
even if there be a default with respect to a claim secure by a mortgage the mortgage shall not extend to the fruit of the mortgage immovable property derive after the default .

because mortgage be right which grasp value of the subject even in the case where an amount of a secured claim exceed the value of the mortgage immovable property a mortgage shall be extinguish if a third party pledgor pay an amount equivalent to value of the subject .
a person who have tender anything as performance of an obligation may not demand the return of the thing tender if the person be negligent in not know that the obligation do not exist .

in the case where a and b be marry to each other and have a minor child c if both a and b be 18 year old parental authority over c shall be exercise jointly by the person who have parental authority over a and the person who have parental authority over b and where there be no person with parental authority over a nor b the family court may appoint a guardian of a minor with respect to c .

for the formation of right of retention under civil code existence of a claim that have arise with respect to the subject matter and possession of the subject matter by the obligee be require but it be not require that the obligee possess the subject matter at the time of the formation of the claim .
if a father who affiliate his child do not have parental authority with regard to the child the father do not have a duty to support the child .

if the superficiary or the lessee have incur useful expense with respect to the land and there be a current increase in value they may at the election of them demand that the owner of the land reimburse monies they pay or the amount of the increase value .

gift shall become effective by the manifestation by one of the party of hisher intention to give hisher property to the other party gratuitously and the acceptance of the other party thereof therefore gift shall not become effective if one of the party to recieve property offer the gift and the other party accept the offer .
an owner of the land shall not assume an obligation to a superficiary to make the land available but a lessor shall assume an obligation to a lessee to make the land available .
the partner who expel may not receive the refund of hisher share .
